Blog.post: ITS SO GREAT HAVING A NEW BOG............. FOR THE FIRST TIME......... HEHEHEHEHE........ MAKLUMLAH, I HV NO COMPUTER...... FIRSTLY, I LIKE TO COMMENT ABT MY CCA.... I HV 2 CCA & I FIND MYSELF MORE INTO KAYAKING THAN NPCC... I DUNNO WHY BUT I FELT DAT BEIN IN NPCC MADE ME FEEL LOW.... NOT JUS LOW BUT REALLY LOW..... ACTUALII JUS HERE 2 SAY HI... COS I'M STILL NEW HERE.... REALLY NEW SO I HV NOTHIN TO TALK ABT .... REALLI........

National championship have just gone & i felt relief even i got 6th a e inddividual event.... i know its like a waste of time..... cos i have to giv wat to my camp for training but i didnt get top 3. but, niwae i m very relief cos i'm jus like a beginner compared to my competitors..... i know that me & my partner, raihanah woldnt forget the experience dat we had during our event... we capsized as soon as they said go...... both of us was so disappointed but HEH!!!!!!!!! LUCK WAS WITH US MAN......... THEY RESTART THE MATCH COS IT WAS A FOUL START.... & U CAN IMAGINE HOW WE FELT..... NIWAE WE TRIED OUR BES...... GO BG! BG! THE C DIVISION GIRLS GET 2ND FOR E NATIONAL CHAMPION & I'M REALLY HAPPY 4 THEM....... & ALSO WE WERE TREAT AT PIZZA HUT.... & guess wat we had made a deal b4 our race..... n evetually we dont get top 3 so we hv to do e challenge...... woa.... e challenge is dat i hv to say to AMAL DAT I LIKE HIM &........ RAIHANAH HV TO TELL SAIFUDDIN DAT SHE LIKE HIM&........ HAHX... WISH ME LUUCK HOH...... U GUYS KNOW WAT ELSE! THE GUYZ DERE AT KALLANG WAS DAMN HOT & SPICY.... NOT ALL BUT QUITE ALOT.... & I KIND OF ATTRACTED TO SOME...... i tell u one of e guys dat i kind of attracted..... his name is ANTHONY from DAMAI......... hahah but still,heh i'm still young got alot to learn.

i really hv to face alot of challenges . Nowadays i've alot bz wif my work. CCA takes......like hhalf of my lifetime but i hv to face it..... i choose dat way of life. 1stly i like to tell u guys whom i really like & mayb love. i really like this guy at school but he doesnt know dat i like him. his name is RASHID.I ALSO LIKE AMALLUDIN...... This guyz hv a speciality in them tdat attracts me alot... even i know they may not be handsome but wat for if u hv looks but bad attitude.... especially dat Alisha,alisah alajh anythinglah wat her name i dont care but wat i care is that SHE'S A BLOODY BITCH, A HOAR......... REALLY STUPID HOAR..... i don't look down on Normal Academic or technical people but i really hv to say dis to her onli...... shes a stupid girl if she's a normal acad jus act as it soooo...... she think she so pretty............ jus looks like a hoar.......... go to hell wif her ..... ireally hate her who want to stare at a ugly gurl who hv an ugly attitude...... perasan.........she's a coward man when she confront me must bring her friendla, dont want me to tell others abt wat happen between me & her...... hah scardy-cat....... idiot. niwae i m really scared waiting for my national canoeing competition.... cant eat dat, cant drink dis, cant drink dat..... so much rule to follow but i tried toooooooo & my family r tempting me.... eeeeeeeeeh!so frustrating......... lastly i like to say i really like AMALLUDIN..........i really like him..........

Hi ya'll...... long time never write..... must be buzy. niwae my Common Test had jus started on wed 11th aug.... tell you the truth me am really scared about commomn test for the first time in my entire life.... WAKAKAKA... maybe me KEPT THINKING ABOUT MY GCE O LEVEL dat i'll b taking next year....... dunno whether i can go through it without any difficulty or hindrance..... me am really scred... but no matter what me goin to do really well & get my o level certificate.... Exams is round the corner. dont u guyz think its 2 early.Phew, thin semeaster is getting more stressing then ever. but seriously, i dont feel the heat at all... WAKAKAKA.... Having a fren look forwward to. i pass my e-maths CA. got A1 for it but still not satisfying.. dunno why... nowadays i feel ??????? i kind of making a performance for the schoool on Teachers Day but we dont hv enough man power.. think of performing next year. Cos i hv a feelin that we dont hv enough time to practise & we may ended up cockin up everythin all again...... In Npcc, me now a NCO... but sometime i dont feel dat its fair... Cos i saw dat its jus the same old people doing the job & getting Busy...... & the same old people who relax & dont have anything to do....but am glad & happy cos a few cadet of mine from Sec 2. praise me of being a gd trainer, they said dat they are havin a lot of fun wif me training them..... & they even asked me on that day to train them again btu i dont have any mood on dat day so no trainin, no learming & no lecturing from me..... niwae me still in kayakin until we passed out next year.... C u guz later...... don;t forget.. PLAY HARD, STUDY HARD, PLAY SMART,STUDY SMART............... WAKAKAKAKAKA............ WAKAKAKAKA
